alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and south central Fergus Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 444 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Moore to near Hobson. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobson, Moore, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Glengarry, Utica, Buffalo, Garneill and Benchland. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 47 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
